attributes.action: Require all police forces to record stop-and-account details, including ethnicity
attributes.additional_details:
From the Guardian article: http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2011/sep/22/police-record-race-stop
The Home Office said: "From 7 March 2011 we have removed the national requirement to record stop and account, in order to reduce police bureaucracy."

Please reinstate the requirement for all police forces to record details of all stop-and-account incidents, including ethnicity, to help avoid targeting people because of their race.
